title: Jorgenson Bullish on Classics: ‘I Have Higher Chances of Winning on Same Team as Van Aert Than Against Him.’
content:
Where does American fit into Visma's multi-leader classics approach? 'We don't have an hierarchy. We play many cards.'

Read the full article at Jorgenson Bullish on Classics: ‘I Have Higher Chances of Winning on Same Team as Van Aert Than Against Him.’ on Velo.
author: ahood
